text: Quazinone (Dozonone) is a cardiotonic and vasodilator drug which was developed and marketed in the 1980s for the treatment of heart disease. It acts as a selective PDE3 inhibitor. It is no longer available. == See also == * Phosphodiesterase inhibitor ==References== ==External links== * Category:Chloroarenes Category:Imidazoquinazolines Category:Inotropic agents Category:Lactams Category:PDE3 inhibitors Category:Vasodilators
title: Quazinone
